content.p: The University of Nottingham has been running its Medicine degree from Nottingham and Derby based hospitals for 50 years. It has helped to train some of the world's leading medical practitioners. You'll be able to explore a broad range of topics alongside national and international leaders in: A100 5 year degree View Medicine course A108 6 year degree (Home/UK students only) View Medicine with a Foundation Year course A101 4 year degree View Graduate Entry Medicine course Get a University of Nottingham degree and the University of Lincoln experience. You'll be based in the beautiful city of Lincoln in our new purpose-built medical school facilities. A10L View Medicine at Lincoln course Meet the team, have a chat and clear any burning questions you might have. There's nothing better to help you make your mind up than to venture out to see our campuses and cities. Both universities are packed with facilities that will make your student life memorable. Contacts: Call 0115 823 0031 ext.30031 or please see our 'contact us' page for further details
